message.content:
Sure! Here's a meal plan for you:

Monday:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with sliced banana and unsweetened almond milk (use soy or rice milk instead)
Snack: Apple slices with sunflower seed butter
Lunch: Grilled chicken breast, quinoa, roasted sweet potatoes, and steamed broccoli
Snack: Carrot sticks with hummus
Dinner: Baked salmon, brown rice, roasted Brussels sprouts, and sautéed spinach

Tuesday:
Breakfast: Smoothie made with frozen mixed berries, banana, unsweetened soy milk, and chia seeds.
Snack: Rice cakes with avocado spread
Lunch: Grilled tofu, brown rice, roasted asparagus, and steamed green beans
Snack: Sliced cucumber with guacamole
Dinner: Turkey meatballs (without garlic), zucchini noodles, and marinara sauce.

Wednesday:
Breakfast: Whole-grain toast with mashed avocado and sliced tomatoes
Snack: Roasted pumpkin seeds
Lunch: Grilled chicken breast, quinoa, roasted butternut squash, and steamed green beans
Snack: Sliced bell peppers with hummus
Dinner: Baked cod, brown rice, roasted Brussels sprouts, and sautéed spinach.

Thursday:
Breakfast: Smoothie made with frozen mixed berries, banana, unsweetened soy milk, and chia seeds.
Snack: Rice cakes with almond butter substitute (made from sunflower seed butter)
Lunch: Grilled tofu, brown rice, roasted asparagus, and steamed green beans
Snack: Sliced cucumber with guacamole
Dinner: Turkey meatballs (without garlic), zucchini noodles, and marinara sauce.

Friday:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with sliced banana and unsweetened soy milk (use rice or oat milk instead)
Snack: Apple slices with sunflower seed butter
Lunch: Grilled chicken breast, quinoa, roasted sweet potatoes, and steamed broccoli
Snack: Carrot sticks with hummus
Dinner: Baked salmon, brown rice, roasted Brussels sprouts, and sautéed spinach.

Saturday:
Breakfast: Smoothie made with frozen mixed berries, banana, unsweetened soy milk, and chia seeds.
Snack: Rice cakes with almond butter substitute (made from sunflower seed butter)
Lunch: Grilled tofu, brown rice, roasted asparagus, and steamed green beans
Snack: Sliced cucumber with guacamole
Dinner: Turkey meatballs (without garlic), zucchini noodles, and marinara sauce.

Sunday:
Breakfast: Whole-grain toast with mashed avocado and sliced tomatoes
Snack: Roasted pumpkin seeds
Lunch: Grilled chicken breast, quinoa, roasted butternut squash, and steamed green beans
Snack: Sliced bell peppers with hummus
Dinner: Baked cod, brown rice, roasted Brussels sprouts, and sautéed spinach.

Note: Please make sure to check ingredient labels carefully for any hidden allergens or cross-contamination.
